decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - Within the context of the planning permission P/1783/21 dated 26/07/2021, the proposed development would be significantly different in its design, and would introduce various new elements of development, and result in alterations to the overall massing of the dwellinghouse. The alterations as a whole would result in a material change to the character and appearance of the host dwelling, street scene and wider area, and also result in a material change in impact on the residential amenities of adjacent neighbours. It would therefore require re-consultation of neighbouring properties, and the proposal would need to be re-assessed against the requirements of Policy D3 of The London Plan (2021) and Policy DM1 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010). The proposal is therefore not considered to be non-material minor amendment.
description: Non Material Amendment To Planning Permission P/1783/21 Dated 26/07/2021 To allow for; various internal alterations, adjustments to the design, size and siting of the proposed rear dormer, a reduction to the width of the crown roof applied to the main dwelling and an expansion to the width of the crown applied to the two storey side to rear extension, the addition of a new roof light to the crown roof applied to the main roof form, alterations to pitches to the corners of the roof, Alterations, to the design, size and siting of some openings, the addition of a new first floor side window, alterations to the design and siting of roof lights, alterations to the design of the dwellinghouse's front canopy, an increase in the floor area of the study within the loft with this expanding into the roof void within the front gable projection, the addition of barge boards and alterations to the detailing to the front of the dwellinghouse's front gable projection, the incorporation of downpipes to the front and rear of the property, alterations to access steps to the rear of the patio, alterations to balustrade railings to the patio.
